entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet watch` hard exits when it cannot launch browser (due to custom log formatting) in .NET 9 #44251
  • [NETSDKE2E]With net9RTM SDK isntalled, install wasm-toos/maui/aspire failed with error "Workload installation failed: Workload manifest dependency 'Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current' version '9.0.0-rtm.24513.1' is lower than version '9.0.0'" #44217

Closed

  • Installation Failure: ".NET SDK 8.0.403" on Windows 11 with Error "This app can't run on your PC" #43994
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.2xx` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #43674
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44114
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #44113
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/main` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #43815
  • Default Uri is wrong when dotnet publish docker image to insecure registry #43618
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.2.24470.13] Fail to build Text-Grab App with CS0116, CS1514, CS1022, CS0118, CS0103 error . #43680
  • Containers: extend environment variables for passing registry credentials #37606
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24379.15] Fail to build CleanArchitecture2 app with an error "CS0619:'MudMenu.OffsetY' is obsolete: 'Use AnchorOrigin or TransformOrigin instead.'" #42509
  • The framework [.../onnxruntime.framework] is a framework of static libraries, and will not be copied to the app #44161
  • Reenable Publish_HostedApp_WithRidSpecifiedAsArgument_NoSelfContained_Works #44210

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2562399 #44252
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44248
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44246
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44243
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Containers] Fix insecure registry handling to use the correct port for the HTTP protocol #44235
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] [Containers] Fix insecure registry handling to use the correct port for the HTTP protocol #44234
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make sure the quality is serialized as culture invariant #44232
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44212
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • Port sdk-diff-tests and license-scan pipelines to 1ES pipeline templates #44238
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix "NETSDK1214" referring to existing diagnostic #44175
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44195
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Remove WorkloadManifestValidator stub project #43642
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [StaticWebAssets] Enable analyzers #44237
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove backported wpf patch #44236
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix port error when fallback to http #44050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Implement support for Aspire #43978
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • stabilize branding for release #44211
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44178
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Add a -sign switch and enable signing for some legs #44207
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fine tune first join point and VMR support for it #44153
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove old source-build controls #43479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Workloads: Support VS component IDs #44198
    Servicing-consider
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Update Microsoft.NET.Sdk.StaticWebAssets.JSModules.targets #44160
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
